title: How to Hook a Car Stereo up in the House with a PSU

steps.title: Depending on year and model of PSU, there may have different color wires.
steps.content: Depending on year and model of PSU, there may have different color wires. on my PSU, there are black, blue, yellow, orange, red, and green.

steps.title: Try to eliminate blue, orange, red and green.
steps.content: Try to eliminate blue, orange, red and green. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Now all the yellow wires using the wire strippers, strip them approximately 1 inch (2.5 cm).
steps.content: Now all the yellow wires using the wire strippers, strip them approximately 1 inch (2.5 cm).

steps.title: Now do the same procedure for the black wires.
steps.content: Now do the same procedure for the black wires. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Strip black, red, and yellow wires.
steps.content: Strip black, red, and yellow wires.

steps.title: Now twist yellow and red wires together.
steps.content: Now twist yellow and red wires together.

steps.title: Connect both yellow and red wires to the psu (YELLOW!
steps.content: Connect both yellow and red wires to the psu (YELLOW! ) wire. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Connect black wire with black on psu.
steps.content: Connect black wire with black on psu.

steps.title: Leave switch off and plug power supply in outlet.
steps.content: Leave switch off and plug power supply in outlet. [4] X Research source
